alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 9:16PM CDT until May 17 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 914 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Sylvan Grove, or 7 miles west of Lincoln, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...75 mph winds have been reported at the Russell Airport. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Ellsworth, Wilson, Kanopolis, Holyrood, Assaria, Gypsum, Geneseo, Brookville, Smolan, Lorraine, New Cambria, Falun, Glendale, Salina Airport, Ellsworth Airport, Bridgeport, Kanopolis Lake, Kanopolis State Park and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 78 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 206 and 228, and between Mile Markers 236 and 266. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Kanopolis Lake, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Winds from this storm will arrive before the rain in about 30 minutes. Remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
